snippet: Playing at Citi Field could help the Mets, especially when they are facing the Dodgers’ aces Clayton Kershaw and Zack Greinke.
abstract: Analysis; New York Mets hold lead in battle for home-field advantage in their division series against Los Angeles Dodgers, advantage that could serve them well when they face Major League Baseball's best pitching duo--Clayton Kershaw and Zack Greinke.
lead_paragraph: Playing at Citi Field could help the Mets, especially when they are facing the Dodgers’ aces Clayton Kershaw and Zack Greinke.

headline.print_headline: Home Edge May Not Mean Much in Mets-Dodgers Series
headline.main: Mets Still Playing for Home-Field Edge
